about:
I am Masha and have two kids Boaz (5) & Luca (3,5).
I live on the Amstel for 8 years. First we lived at a real boat, a sailing ship. We were in love of this place because of the oase of peace & nature in the middle of the city. But because of kids coming the ship became too small for 2 kids, so we started to realise an ark, this took about 1,5 year. On the 1st birthday of our daugther Luca this Ark was shipped to this place and still we are enjoying and we even love this place more and more. 
I am a personal life coach, trainer and freelance project manager. My passion is to create indivudual, and social changes.
More info about me & the houseboat:
* (URL HIDDEN)
* (URL HIDDEN)

recommendation.recommendation: I had a great time staying in the houseboat. It is located on a very nice spot on the Amstel in Amsterdam with a fantastic view. The window can open fully and you have the feeling you are part the boats passing by. It is a uniek place. It is  bigger then a hotel room and the living / sleeping part is separately which is a big plus.  Masha is a great host and shared very nice tips about thinks to do and places to eat. I loved it and wil come back.

review.comments:
Sehr schönes, super gelegenes Haus-"Boot", eigentlich aber mehr ein Floß mit einem Bungalow. Die Lage unmittelbar auf der Amstel (bei geöffnetem Fenster kommen Enten und Schwäne "zu Besuch"), in der Nachbarschaft Restaurants, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und alles Andere, macht die Unterkunft sehr sympathisch, die Größe ist für ein Paar völlig ausreichend. Wer allerdings Probleme damit hat, unter Wasser ohne Fenster zu schlafen, sollte sich nach einer Wohnung umsehen.
Wir jedenfalls waren sehr zufrieden und konnten die Tage in der wunderbaren Stadt Amsterdam sehr genießen !
Masha war eine völlig unkomplizierte Gastgeberin, alles hat bestens geklappt.
